---
title: Overnight Protein Oats
description: Overnight protein oats
categories: [Healthy, Breakfast, Protein, Snack]
cooktime: 12 hours
date: 2023-06-01
---

## Ingredients

* 2 scoops protein powder (~50g)
* 215 g non fat plain greek yogurt
* 1/4 tsp cinnamon
* 1/2 tsp vanilla extract
* 1 1/2 tbsp chia seed
* 1 tbsp honey

## Directions

Add all ingredients in a bowl and mix well. Cover and refrigerate overnight. Top with 1/2 banana in the morning.
